SELECT USER_NEWS_ID , NEWS_TITLE , REMARK , NEWS_CONTENTS , USE_YN , CATEGORY , PROV_NM , PUB_DT FROM BM_NEWS_USER_SET
CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR NEWS_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')

SELECT CATEGORY , PROV_NM , NEWS_TITLE , PUB_DT , USE_YN , RENEW_DATE , SEQ FROM BM_NEWS
CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR NEWS_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR PROV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
GROUP BY NEWS_TITLE

SELECT VH.VHC_NO , LG.MNG_ID , MAX(LG.SEND_DATE) AS SEND_DATE FROM BM_VHC_INFO VH LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DV ON VH.VHC_ID = DV.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_LIVING_LOG LG ON DV.MNG_ID = LG.MNG_ID WHERE LG.ATTR_ID = "CD001" GROUP BY VH.VHC_NO
